website_summaries.verdict: The PRO-Keds Royal Hi Classic Canvas will make sure you’re kicking it right—old-school style. These high-tops have a unique design that sets it apart from the classic high sneakers most everyone sports.They’re great for all around leisure wear and are light and comfortable enough to be worn all day. But don’t let the sneakers stylish good looks fool you. They belie a tough exterior that will last you a good long while. Their only drawback is that they run long.
pros: A good many reviewers were pleased with the clean look and old-school style of the PRO-Keds Royal Hi Classic Canvas sneakers
They said the shoes were a little bit different and were a great alternative to the Chuck Taylors
Several people lauded the good fit of the casual high-top sneakers
A number of people reported receiving compliments on their choice of lifestyle kicks
They added that the high-tops were great for casual wear, from errand shopping to just kicking around
Some users were impressed with how comfortable the PRO-Keds Royal Hi Classic Canvas shoes are
A few reviewers called the high-top sneakers as “reliable shoes that remind you of your youth.” They said that the shoes are sturdy, have a firm feel, and feature tough soles
A couple of testers commented that the lifestyle shoes are light and feel like part of the feet when you move
One individual was extremely pleased with the affordable price of the PRO-Keds Royal Hi Classic Canvas sneakers
cons: The PRO-Keds Royal Hi Classic Canvas sneakers run a little long, a few consumers stated

customer_reviews.title: SO HAPPY TO FIND A NEW PAIR..
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE MY PRO KEDS . I HAVE A SINCE 1978 AND THEY STILL FIT . WHITE HIGH TOP. THEY ARE WONDERFUL AND NIW THEY ARE ALITTLE OUT OF COLOR BUT STILL LOVE THE M. I Bought the old pair for 10.00 Dollars. That was 41 Years ago..THANK YOU
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was very impressively packaged
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fits great and is comfortable. It was delivered fast. I was disappointed in the design. It lacked the classic blue glued on pro keds name plate in the back and some of the pin stripes I remember as the days of old. Don't be deterred by the 3 star rating. It's still a good shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Eric W. Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Better than the other brand, Converse better up their game. These are better made and more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Razer

customer_reviews.title: Classic!
customer_reviews.text: A blast from the past! My husband loves these! Perfect fit, very comfortable & classic styling.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon H.

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable and well made classic sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Converse are too narrow for me. ProKeds are more comfortable and better made. Classic as can be. My insoles fit in them without a problem and allow me to wear them all day.
customer_reviews.author: Greybeard65

customer_reviews.title: Takes me back to the 1970s before NIKE was king. I love them.
customer_reviews.text: Ladies when using the sizing chart provided remember the sizes listed are men's sizes. I wear a size 9 women's so I ordered a 71/2 and it fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: brooklyn's best

customer_reviews.title: Super pro keds
customer_reviews.text: I like the product it reminds me of my days in Jr H.S same style. same fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great product at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoe and the way that it fits and looks. I owned a pair of pro kids about 42 years ago and they still look and wear the same.
customer_reviews.author: Roy b. Dorsey

customer_reviews.title: That They are true Pro Keds
customer_reviews.text: They are true Pro Keds... Fit just like when I was a kid. Wish I could play hoops and give 'em a good tryout...
customer_reviews.author: ImSoQuazy

customer_reviews.title: Don't Bother
customer_reviews.text: We used to get Keds when I was a kid. We would run around all summer and they would last until I out-grew them. These self-destructed after two months of sitting at a desk in my office. WTF.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff

customer_reviews.title: The color is not bright white its a slightly offwhite
customer_reviews.text: Great head turner, comfortable, clean shoe. I parked all me converse street hi tops for this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are just what we needed. I have avoided ordering from Amazon since they started selling Nlue Lives Murder shirts, but this is the only place I could find them,otherwise I would have found a better place as I support out law enforcement officers. Delivery was quick.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Ortolani

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Runs a little large but if you like keds, this is a good buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Old school sneakers. (Early 70s)
customer_reviews.text: Having these sneakers is like going back in time! When I was a young teenager. If i had a second set of strings I would have put them in.
customer_reviews.author: K Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Great sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful pair of Sneakers!! Need to get it a size larger if you wear thick sox!!
customer_reviews.author: george rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Fit and Feel great
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased for my dad and he loves 'em !
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Donathan

customer_reviews.title: Sneaker Man
customer_reviews.text: My favorite sneaks. Glad they're making them again. Looking forward to more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Alan J. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, exactly what my son wanted
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, exactly what my son wanted. The only downside .. the brand tag on back of shoe keeps coming off
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelene Huggard

customer_reviews.title: Mr Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: He is satisfied with the shoe and has no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Save me another pair size 7
customer_reviews.text: I need buy another one por because this is to big for me o return this one and when recibe the money back I’m going to buy another one but size 7 can you guys save one pair for me
customer_reviews.author: Eliezer

customer_reviews.title: Sticker on wrong side.
customer_reviews.text: Seems like the pro keds sticker should be on other side of sneaker . should be for people to see.
customer_reviews.author: christin

customer_reviews.title: These turned out to be the real-deal sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Feel like a kid again! The fit is perfect, not undersized, I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Jay R Doremus

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were very well made. They went through much bad weather and are still good. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was informed that this shoe is true to size ...
customer_reviews.text: I was informed that this shoe is true to size; but I discovered upon receipt of the sneaker that they actually run almost a full size larger than expected. It's too much inconvenience to return them, so I'll have to take a loss on this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Go pro-kets
customer_reviews.text: It like flash from the past, since I was young man I like prokets.
customer_reviews.author: Santos

product_meta.title: Keds Men's Royal Hi White Boot, White, 10.5 M US
product_meta.description: Get an iconic style in the Pro-Keds Royal Hi Classic Canvas. Durable canvas uppers with a round, reinforced rubber toe. Lace-up closure with flat cotton laces and aluminum eyelets. Breathable fabric linings. Features a molded and cushioned, open cell, foam footbed with added arch and forefoot support. Iconic red and blue PRO-Keds powerstripes at midsole. Remastered last with a gum rubber outsole. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 15 oz Product measurements were taken using size 11.5, width D - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size.
feature_bullets: Durable 12.5 oz Canvas with contrast stitching
Molded footbed with open cell foam for breathability
Red and blue power stripe details with an off-white midsole
